about_the_game:
A short visual novel about fear, choice, miracle, adventure, friendship, love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. At the beginning of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of a mini-platformer to find out what happens next.

The game is based on the story "Twilight" by Sveta Sky.
Images, backgrounds, characters, styles are created by artificial intelligence.
Translation into other languages ​​is done manually using a translator.
The developer, the author of the text is Sveta Sky.
The game is created on the Ren'Py engine.


The base language is Russian. The translation may contain untranslatable variables.
The visual novel also includes a small platformer mini-game in Python.
To start learning the story, the player must grant victory to the zombies.
The game contains sounds, backgrounds, melodies that may cause anxiety.


It is recommended to play in silence, without unnecessary background noise, at night for a greater effect.
The novella takes from 2 to 4 hours to complete.
Immerse yourself in a short story on a warm evening!

name: Twilight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) Silver N5030 CPU @ 1.10GHz 1.10 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64-разрядная операционная система, процессор x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) Silver N5030 CPU @ 1.10GHz 1.10 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64-разрядная операционная система, процессор x64
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Twilight is a small dividing line between light and darkness. Sometimes you have to choose where you should stay and for what purpose.
